The place where all the fun is happening.

Oncase Sandbox is a space maintained by some crazy people in our company that insist to share some ideas and crazy projects that they're working on. It's usually stuff to be used with Pentaho applications and environments.

Cubeguard
Cubeguard is a Pentaho plugin that intends to deliver some simplicity on implementing mondrian security.
Tapa
With tapa you can easily customize your Pentaho Login page.
viz.graph
Deploy a Graph visualization to your Pentaho Analyzer - based on arbor.js
